TopicTitle: How to land a Starship automatically?

Articles.Content: Either KOS scripts or other mods are both okay. thx

You'd better ask this guy, he succeeded after a few attempts and might give you some tips.

Other than that, you could search on github, there are a few examples like this one

Download macjeb and then check the box that says auto land or something

Remember after download move it to the "game data" folder and unzip it if it is gamedata/macjeb/macjeb/"files for macjeb" then make sure that you change it to be gamedata/macjeb/"the files for macjeb"

Now after writing this. Isn't it called mechjeb2?
Should working for a Spaceship too.

I've got a GUI for some cool (at least I think so) kOS scripts if that's what you're looking for:

https://github.com/Janus1992/KSP_Starship-kOS-Interface
